attributes.name: kinematicsInWaveZone
attributes.description: Type of kinematics in wave zone

attributes.name: defaultProcedureOn
attributes.description: If chosen the default kinematics points procedure is run in RIFLEX. If not chosen the default procedure is not run in RIFLEX. In both cases additional detailed specification of wave kinematics points are run if present.

attributes.name: nodeStep
attributes.description:
Wave kinematics is calculated for every "Node Step" node between Z Lower
and Z Upper

attributes.name: zLower
attributes.description: Z-coordinate indicating lowest node position for which wave kinematics are calculated

attributes.name: applyDiffractedWaves
attributes.description: Whether diffracted wave points are to be specified

attributes.name: waveKinematicsFile
attributes.description: Whether wave kinematics time series should be read from file or not

attributes.name: waveKinematicsFileName
attributes.description: Reference to a wave kinematics file

attributes.name: waveKinematicsMaxColumns
attributes.description: Maximum number of columns in the wave kinematics time series file

attributes.name: waveKinematicsTimeColumn
attributes.description: Column number for time in the wave kinematics time series file
